ModMetaData.name: Vulpine Race Pack (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Xen
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Xens mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018389163
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wtwHAQu.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/VulpineRacePack
--- Original Description --- The Fenii and Frijjid are Vulpine races nased on Fennec (Vulpes/Fennecus Zerpa) and arctic (Vulpes Lagopus) foxes respectively. Uses the Alien Framework V2.0 by Erdelf and co. Frijjid art by Mikerobe
